name: Screenshot_2.png
headline: The Binding of Isaac
body: The Binding of Isaac is a roguelike video game designed by independent developers Edmund McMillen and Florian Himsl. It was released in 2011 for Microsoft Windows, then ported to OS X, and Linux. The game's title and plot are inspired by the Biblical story of the Binding of Isaac. In the game, Isaac's mother receives a message from God demanding the life of her son as proof of her faith, and Isaac, fearing for his life, flees into the monster-filled basement of their home where he must fight to survive. Players control Isaac or one of the 6 other unlockable characters through a procedurally generated dungeon in a roguelike manner, fashioned after those of The Legend of Zelda, defeating monsters in real-time combat while collecting items and power-ups to defeat bosses and eventually Isaac's mother.

name: updatee.png
headline: Update 27.04.2024
body:
changes

  • added discord logins
  • live preview when you create an article
  • authors in the homepage
  • changed url structure (old links dont work anymore!)
  • ui changes
  • bug fixes

upcoming features

  • comments
  • markdown editor (WYSIWYG)
  • edit your own articles
  • possibly embed for your author profile
  • ui changes
  • bug fixes

known bugs

  • live preview isnt exactly the same as when you publish it
  • light mode says that you are on dark mode when you refresh
  • time published hover isnt quite right

name: Untitled.png
headline: Update 30.04.2024
body:
Changes

  • Ui Changes
  • New body textarea (WYSIWYG)
this is very experimental!
  • Embed for your profile
  • URL structure changed again (old links that don't use new structure won't work)

 

Bug Fixes

  • Preview should almost be the same as published
  • Fixed theme state on navbar
  • Fixed time hover

 

Coming up next

  • Pagination params (save the page you are currently on)
  • Comments
  • Editing your article
  • Register account with credientials
  • paste from clipboard news cover (maybe)

 

Known bugs

  • number list, lists isn't working (fixed)
  • extremely long single words goes across the screen lol (fixed)

name: ezgif-3-59da70e5eb.gif
headline: wassup my brothers and sisters!
body:
Hey, everyone! Welcome back to my channel! So, I just got back from an amazing holiday in Portugal, and let me tell you, it was an absolute blast! 🎉

 

First up, I headed to the Alentejo region, and oh my goodness, it was like stepping into a whole new world! The scenery was breathtaking, the people were so friendly, and the atmosphere was just electric! And guess what? There was this epic festival happening with rock music blasting from every corner! 🤘🎸

 

I danced my heart out, sang along with the crowd, and made some incredible memories with my new friends. Seriously, guys, partying in Portugal is a whole vibe! It's so cool how music brings people together from all walks of life. Plus, the energy was contagious!

 

And let's not forget about the beach! On the last day of my trip, I made sure to squeeze in some relaxation time in Faro before heading back to London. The sun, the sand, the sound of the waves crashing against the shore – it was the perfect way to wrap up my holiday.

 

Overall, my time in Portugal was nothing short of amazing. From rocking out at the festival in Alentejo to soaking up the sun in Faro, every moment was filled with adventure and fun. Until next time, Portugal, obrigado for the memories! ✈️🇵🇹

name: Desktop - 8.png
headline: Update: Edit this, edit that!
body:
Okay, this is a pretty big one, here are patch notes for May 21st 2024! 

there are probably more changes but I forgot

✨ New & Changes

  • Be able to edit articles and comments! (No news cover yet)
  • Better article preview for desktop
  • Share comments
  • Comment markdown
  • Embed for comments and likes
  • Register users using credentials
  • New login and register page
  • UI change on your profile (settings)
  • Better not found page
  • Be able to dismiss users in homepage
  • Edited articles or comments will display as edited
  • Replaced most icons with new
  • Added more paginations to needed places
  • More toast messages
  • Toasts are now on the left
  • Comments are now 512 max characters instead of 256
  • New loading icon
  • UX improvements
  • Server improvements

✨ New 03.05.2024

  • Comments were added
  • Comment likes were added
  • Pagination params were added

🔨 Upcoming

  • Homepage UI change
  • Reply to comments
  • Likes for articles (Added)
  • Account Linking
  • Forget passwords
  • Search

⚙️ Fixes

  • Likes didn’t have correct time
  • Likes should be more optimised
  • Most actions that probably needed redirect will now redirect user
  • You could’ve still posted while news cover was uploading
  • Replaced non-existent articles with a notfound page instead of loading
  • Some actions acted as normal even when there was a error
  • The loading on navbar was on the whole navbar
  • Pagination buttons could’ve gone higher than existing pages
  • Code cleanup

🐛 Known Bugs

  • Some toasts stay like deleting more than 2 comments (Fixed)
  • Some markdown elements aren't the same (Fixed)
  • If you upload a file that is too big you can't publish article (Fixed)
